Did you know that a group of rats is called a 'mischief'.
Did you know that the scientific name of a rat is Rattus. Hence, a common Black Rat is called a 'Rattus Rattus.
A Gambian Pouched Rat named Magawa was responsible for finding over 100 landmines in Cambodia in his carreer as a mine clearing rat.
